metadata.title: CVE-2021-32294 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libgig through 20200507. A heap-buffer-overflow exists in the function RIFF::List::GetSubList located in RIFF.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause code Execution.

criterions.comment: libgig package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
